question: The legislature of which country is considering the setting up of a Gandhi-Martin Luther King Jr Development Foundation to commemorate the 150<sup>th</sup> birth anniversary of Gandhi?
explanation: The US house of Representatives has passed a bill to promote the legacy of Mahatma Gandhi and Martin Luther King Jr. It proposes the establishment of Gandhi-King Development Foundation (to be created by USAID under the Indian laws), Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative (allocates 2 million USD until 2025) and Gandhi-King global academy (professional training initiative on conflict resolution).
